Text: Yes, all nice, BUT WATCH OUT ! If you become a muslim and then opt out again, according to sharia law you could and should BE KILLED, what a religion of tolerance and love of human freedom.... :-)

bodthedog;

there is nothing in quran about 70 offshoots, I memorized all quraan and nothing like this is in quran.

and about the 170 who claim to be true muslim; all of them have the same quran, and the right muslims of those 170 are who obey quran exactly, so it is very clear who is true and wrong, & FOR YOU MY FRIEND ALL WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO TO KNOW THE TRUTH IS TO LEARN BETTER ABOUT QURAN & it will be then very clear who is the real muslim, so please don't judge on islam by deeds of muslims(not real muslims, but masking by islam), just judge by what you read in quran

may allah guide you the right way (this is the goal of islam, not to kill nor to burn in hell)

best regards
Ahmad

and in Surat Al-QaÅŸaÅŸ ayah 55 : (((And when they hear ill speech, they turn away from it and say, "For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. Peace will be upon you; we seek not the ignorant.")))
